mapper.sql: id, document_id, content_vector, chunk_index, chunk_content, similarity, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM kb_document_vector WHERE document_id = #{documentId} ORDER BY chunk_index ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kb_document_vector (id, document_id, content_vector, chunk_index, chunk_content, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{documentId}, #{contentVector}::vector, #{chunkIndex}, #{chunkContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ON CONFLICT (document_id, chunk_index) DO UPDATE SET content_vector = EXCLUDED.content_vector, chunk_content = EXCLUDED.chunk_content
